articles.title: True Masterpiece Hung in Family's TV Room as a Joke - Newser
articles.description: 400-year-old work by Pieter Bruegel the Younger surfaces, sells for $845K
articles.content: An auctioneer was assessing the value of art and artifacts at a home in northern France last fall when a canvas caked in dust caught his eye. Partially concealed by a door in a darkened TV room, the … [+1938 chars]
